title: Finder, Vol. 02: Sin-Eater 2
description: Jaeger Ayers is a Finder, a super-scout born -or maybe made- for a survivor`s life. He`s an explorer whose past is a mystery to him, a loner who finds himself returning to Emma and her children, the only people in his life who feel like family. In this second part of Sin-Eater, he must ask himself how far he will go to protect them from his best Brigham, Emma`s husband.
author: Carla Speed McNeil
